review: It's nice to have a remote in some cases, but I've gone back to primarily using my Chromecast since the Fire Stick didn't cast Youtube and Netflix as smoothly from my phone as the Chromecast does. The Fire Stick is excellent if you want to find content through the FireTV interface, but if you're looking to cast YouTube or Netflix or other apps from your phone, I find the Chromecast gives a better user experience.
